full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### National Database for DNA (NotDNA Data Bank) Blood and Buccal FTA Collection Kits

> **Reference Number**: WS3799449973
> **Solicitation Number**: WS3799449973
> **Publication Date**: January 17, 2023
> **Tender Closing Date**: February 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
> **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2023
> **Expected Contract End Date**: April 1, 2028

**Prepared by Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Gatineau, QC

**Procurement Information**

* ** Solicitation Number**: WS3799449973
* **Classification**: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment (41100000)

**Procurement Category**: Government Direct

**Request for Proposal**: Request for Bid Proposal to Supply National Database for DNA (NotDNA Data Bank) Blood and Buccal FTA Collection Kits.

**Key Requirements**

* Submission of bid must be received by February 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Acknowledgement of notice must be provided in writing.
* Written notification must be sent to Contracting Entity prior to Tender Closing Date.

**Summary and Description of Requirement**
The National DNA Data Bank requires Supply National Database for DNA (NotDNA Data Bank) Blood and Buccal (FTA) Collection Kits. Requirements include the following materials:

* Kit 1: 30,000 Blood Collection Kits
* Kit 2: 1,000 Buccal Collection Kits

The materials shall be delivered to Ottawa, ON.

**Selection Criteria**: The bidder with the lowest price will be awarded with the contract.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
This Solicitation is open to bidders who meet the requirements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and/or the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Contact Information

* Contractor's Representative: Chad Bellerdine, chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The contact information for any inquiries, or for asking to register for access to the request for tenders document, is included below.

> “Contact Information” paragraph was excluded.

**Notice URL**
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15155818?extsite=MTUxNTU4MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA
